Text:
This one worked for me on 10.5.1. You could always try MacFUSE instead, it's freeware and gives read/write access to NTFS drives.

Mac OS X includes native read for NTFS but not write, these apps enable writing as well.
Meh. Just use MacFUSE + NTFS-3G - it's free, open, and works fine... probably better than this.
